channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Tesla Model Y pas chère, faillites dans le vélo, Renault Twingo – l’actu électrique de la semaine
item.description: De la Tesla Model Y à prix imbattable à l’explosion du marché des vélos électriques, en passant par la supercar BYD U9 frôlant les 500 km/h, le secteur électrique prouve qu’il ne dort jamais. Voici les sujets qui vous ont le plus passionnés ces derniers jours sur Survoltés.

item.title: What Is Dan Trachtenberg’s ‘Predator’ Trilogy About?
item.description: From 'Prey' to 'Killer of Killers' and now 'Badlands,' Trachtenberg may be using 'Predator' to drive a point home.

item.title: Grab the Amazon Fire HD 8 tablet for its lowest price yet ahead of Black Friday
Disney+ is giving its apps a visual revamp, for easier navigation and more personalization – here's what's new
item.description: If you're a Disney+ subscriber in the US, then you'll notice some changes in the look of your streaming apps.

item.title: Black Friday savings start now: MSI’s 2TB Spatium M470 Pro SSD is already on sale priced at just £96.99
item.description: The 2TB MSI Spatium M470 Pro SSD delivers PCIe 4.0 performance with read speeds up to 6,000MB/s, and it’s available for just £96.99 in time for Black Friday.

item.title: Quelle console Nintendo Switch, OLED ou Switch 2, choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: La nouvelle Nintendo Switch 2 est disponible mais le constructeur propose encore plusieurs déclinaisons de la Switch 1 : la Switch classique, la Switch OLED et Lite. Quelles sont les spécificités et les différences de chacune, et quelle Nintendo Switch est faite pour vous ou pour la personne de votre choix ? Switch 2, Switch OLED ou Switch Lite, que choisir ? ...

item.title: I've been tracking camera prices all year: here are the genuine record-low prices for Canon, Sony, Nikon, and others this Black Friday
item.description: Been holding out for a new camera? This week's early Black Friday deals at Adorama and B&H Photo include genuine record-low prices on some of our favorite models.

item.title: OpenAI asked Trump administration to expand Chips Act tax credit to cover data centers
item.description: A recent letter from OpenAI reveals more details about how the company is hoping the federal government can support the company's ambitious plans for data center construction.

item.title: BioWare’s Cryptic ‘Mass Effect 5 ‘ Art is Building the Game’s Story
item.description: The studio says everything it's put out for 'Mass Effect 5' thus far will lead to what awaits the next chapter in its sci-fi saga.

item.title: Trumps transportation head imposes a space launch curfew. Heres why.
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration will temporarily limit when commercial rockets can launch, due to the ongoing government shutdown.
